Name: Zombie Outbreak
Description:
The ultimate zombie experience.

Your mission is simple. Kill the undead and if you manage to navigate the streets and find the transport ship, you’ll never feel more alive.

Name: PVP EARLY ACCESS (STRICTLY LIMITED)
Description:
Be among the first in the world to compete in our Player Versus Player experience.

4 vs. 4 team battles across 3 maps.

Get the opportunity to give us your feedback and shape the game.

Receive an exclusive, limited edition gift.

Name: 12 Player PvP
Description: Zero Latency office use only.

Name: 3 x Sol Raiders
Description:
Player VS Player team-based shooter experience.

Pilot your combat rig across 3 unique maps raiding for Sol. The winners make the score. The losers are just scrap metal.

Name: 2 x Sol Raiders + Zombie Survival
Description:
Player VS Player team-based shooter experience.

Pilot your combat rig across 3 unique maps raiding for Sol. The winners make the score. The losers are just scrap metal.

Zombie Survival | Your team is trapped in a fort, amidst a zombie outbreak. A rescue team is on its way but you must hold the fort.

Name: 2 x Sol Raiders + Engineerium
Description:
Player VS Player team-based shooter experience.

Pilot your combat rig across 3 unique maps raiding for Sol. The winners make the score. The losers are just scrap metal.

Engineerium | Be transformed into an ethereal, ancient alien, and work with your clan to ascend through a mind-bending, mystical world.

Name: Singularity + Sol Raiders
Description:
Singularity | You're sent to investigate a secret military space station that has gone dark where you fight killer robots and rogue drones.

Name: Singularity
Description: A secret military space station has gone dark and it falls on you and your team to investigate why. No signs of life remain… well, human life anyway. Your journey to space begins, but will the answers you find lead to your end?
